definition: fetus dies in the belly/(fig.) plans or projects failed before being carried out
fetus/litter/tire/abbr. of 輪胎|轮胎

abdomen/stomach/belly
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right

sentences.english: But, the prospect of a U. S. -Soviet mission to the Moon died with Kennedy.
sentences.chinese: 但肯尼迪的遇刺讓合作計劃很快胎死腹中。

sentences.english: Last week's default crisis helped kill that prospect then.
sentences.chinese: 然而，上週的債務危機讓這一希望胎死腹中。

sentences.english: By the time she went to hospital on the Monday morning, her baby was stillborn.
sentences.chinese: 當她週一上午到醫院檢查時，她的嬰兒已胎死腹中。

sentences.english: Of course, that baby didn't vanish.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，這個嬰兒並未胎死腹中。
